aesthetic_envelope: Restrained cinematic realism: muted palette, practical light, wide-to-normal lenses, minimal VFX, tactile materials.

selected_refs.guidance: Track past moving crowd; keep fluorescents flat and scuffed linoleum. No hero grade.
Still-life device close-up: brushed plastic, tidy cable, single red dot. No readable branding.
Abstract countdown on smudged glass; thumb hovering. Avoid real phone UI and text-heavy overlays.
POV shift to CCTV: mild compression blocks, simple overlay bars only. Cold LEDs, no found-footage chaos.
Threshold close-up: chain texture, peeling paint, dust in light slit. Threat stays offscreen.
Consequence insert: porcelain tile + minimal smear + paper towel fibers. Sterile, not gory.
Endless corridor symmetry: matte walls, rubber baseboards, repeating doors. Keep props near-zero.
Cold wide: wet tarmac sheen, low cloud ceiling, tiny car. Muted, not scenic.
Somatic close: breath vapor, knit fabric edge, anonymous framing. No romantic soft focus.
Optional title sting: one centered word, subtle grain, long hold. No logo animation.

anti_guidance: Use anti refs as NEGATIVE blocks to prevent: teal-orange hero grade, neon cyberpunk glow, anime stylization, vlog/captions.
